channel.title: CVE Feed for https://fooplugins.com -- FooGallery Premium
channel.description: The latest CVEs for https://fooplugins.com -- FooGallery Premium

item.title: CVE-2023-6747|2024-08-02T08:42:07.353Z -- https%3A%2F%2Ffooplugins.com -- foogallery%20premium
item.description: The Best WordPress Gallery Plugin â€“ FooGallery plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the custom attributes in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for contributors and above to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
